Text:
A bit of seeding would be much appreciated...nothing has happened since yesterday.
Best Orvar8.

What a pathetic album. Not a single track is worth remembering. The only reason to download this sordid album is to find out what a completely hopeless guy Charles Manson was. Good thing that he is still in prison. May he remain there until his death.
Quite a daft bastard indeed, but some of the things he said were very true.
Sick City is a very disturbing song (and kind of catchy too).  It gives you an eerie glimpse into what was going through his mind.
yea he was a sycopath but his music is catchy and i find it interesting.....
this music is amazing. think about the guy behind it is kind of creepy, but it adds to the music in a way. the crazy part is alot of what Manson says is true.
he can play and sing. nothing special but better than some. certainly had potential. would have been good with a co writor or editor but I dont think thats manson's style lol

Great songs 
Charlie shoulda been a musician not a hobo
If Manson wasn't who he is, nobody would give a rat's arse about his music. He almost made it big with The Beach Boys, but they recognised him for what he is; an untalented nutjob.
